      • backup

        private void backup​(Context context)
             throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        Runs backup for a specific site and given config
        i.e. wb backup site1 -i arg1: site1 - site name
        flag1: -i - incremental type
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException

      • restore

        private void restore​(Context context)
              throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException,
                     com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        Restores a file from remote server to desired destination i.e. wb restore site1-incremental2023-2-5.7z /home/yarvelian/appTesting/backups/site1/incremental
        arg1: site1-incremental2013-2-5.7z - zip to retrieve from the root directory, site name set in config file.
        arg2: path to extract files from zip
        retrieved zip gets deleted after action
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException

      • listBackups

        private void listBackups​(Context context)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Method that lists backups on the local server where the cron job/or the app is run Usage: wb list-backups -b, wb list-backups -i
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • listSites

        private void listSites​(Context context)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Method that lists sites on the local server where the cron job/or the app is run Usage: wb list-sites -e, wb list-sites -d default: wb list-sites, lists enabled sites.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • restoreFiles

        private void restoreFiles​(Context context)
                   throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException,
                          com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        restores files named in a text file from a zip retrieved from a remote server to desired location. i.e. wb "site1-incremental2023-2-5.7z" /home/yarvelian/appTesting/filesToRestore.txt /home/yarvelian/appTesting/backups/site1/incremental/ where:
        arg1 "site1-incremental2023-2-5.7z": zip to be retrieved
        arg2: /home/yarvelian/appTesting/filesToRestore.txt text file containing file names to be restored
        arg3: /home/yarvelian/appTesting/backups/site1/incremental/ destination folder for files extraction.
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

        private void auto​(Context context)
           throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException,
                  com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException,
                  java.io.IOException,
                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        Takes config name as argument to retrieve files enabled and run all jobs. PATH REQUIRED!
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException

        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getOption

        public void getOption​(java.lang.String command,
                      java.lang.String line)
        This method is used to run proper command from the list.
        i.e. provide backup, restore, etc.
        default should represent a warning/error based on the input
        Parameters:
        command - The type of CLI command
        line - user input
